prompts.frontCover: A minimalist, 2D flat illustration of two cartoon pieces of toast. One piece of toast is plain with a simple happy face. The other piece of toast has a small, cute party hat and a single lit birthday candle, and is whispering to the first piece of toast. A small, elegant speech bubble comes from the whispering toast. Centered below the illustration, the text reads in a beautiful, readable, handwritten cursive script: "Happy birthday to my butter half". The entire design is centered, with plenty of white space, using clean lines and a simple, limited color palette.
prompts.backCover: A minimal 2D flat vector logo. An abstract, simplified slice of butter is centered inside a simple circle outline. The design uses a warm, limited color palette of golden yellow and soft brown. The logo is placed in the top-center of the frame, with the bottom half of the image, especially the bottom-right corner, left completely empty as negative space. The background is a clean, solid off-white. The overall aesthetic is elegant, clean, and modern, with plenty of white space.
prompts.leftInterior: A subtle, abstract 2D flat vector pattern. Irregular, soft-edged geometric shapes and small, simple dots are scattered gracefully across the canvas, reminiscent of crumbs and melted butter puddles. The design uses a cohesive, warm, and limited color palette of butter yellow, toast brown, and soft cream against a solid off-white background. The composition is balanced but asymmetrical, with more visual density at the top and bottom, leaving the center relatively open. The overall style is minimalist, elegant, and playful.
prompts.rightInterior:
A minimal and elegant 2D flat vector composition designed to frame a text area. A single, delicate, curved line in a soft brown color sweeps down from the top-left corner and another simple, short line curves up from the bottom-right corner. A few scattered, small, golden-yellow dots are placed near these lines. The vast majority of the space is left as a clean, solid off-white background, creating a sophisticated and open area for a handwritten message. The design is extremely minimalist, serving as a subtle accent to the page.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "To my favorite person, Lao Lao,

Happy Birthday! You're officially one year older, wiser, and dangerously close to knowing all my secrets. Thanks for being born and for putting up with me—I know the second one is a full-time job.

All my love,
Jordan"
